item.title: How to Enable Shared Folders in Linux Mint Cinnamon
item.description: 1. Install Samba sudo apt install samba 2. Force your user in the Config sudo nano /etc/samba/smb.conf Add under [global]: force user = your-username-in-your-mint-account 3. Restart sudo systemctl restart smbd sudo systemctl status smbd 4. Share a folder RIght click a folder. Go to the Share tab. Check Allow Others and Guest Access, then Create Share. Check the Folder in another computer Go to another computer. Go Network and check the folder
